titleStmt.title: Nashauanittue meninnunk wutch Mukkiesog, wussesemumun wutch sogkodtunganash Naneeswe Testamentsash; wutch ukkesitchippooonganoo ukketeahogkounooh. Nogon'ac wussukhùmun ut Engllishm'anne unnun-toowaonganit, nashpe ne 'anue, wunnergen'uc nohtrompeantog. Noh asoow'esit John Cotton. Kah yeuyeu qoshkinn'umun en Indianæ unnontoo-waonganit wutch oonenchikqun'aout Indianae Mukkiesog, nashpe Grindal Rawson. Wunnaunchemook'ae nohtompeantog ut kenugke Indianog.
Spiritual milk for babes. North American Indian.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, John, 1584-1652.
Rawson, Grindal, 1659-1715. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printeuoop nashpe Samuel Green, kah Bartholomew Green,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Grindal Rawson, of: Cotton, John. Spiritual milk for babes.
Reproduction of the original in the St. John's Library, Cambridge (England).
